body:
Hello there!
Here is a new Forum Minigame called A poem to a friend.
It is pretty easy;
You have to write a poem to a friend, to your best friend.
It's steps are first think about your best friend, someone who you love with your heart and would give anything for his/her safety, or a really good friend. Think in what he/she makes you happy, why is your friend, why he/she makes you feel special, etc.

I'll give mine as example.
Mine: 
"I know I say it and repeat it everytime, but I never can stop feeling very glad for have you as friend: Thank you for be my friend. Thank you for understand me everytime. Basically, you are the reason of why I'm alive, otherwise, I surely won't be alive. You are what makes me happy, what makes me wake up each morning, and go to sleep each night. You are the reason of why now I'm being happy, and why I feel I'm special only with you. You occupied a very special place in my heart, and if you'd stop being my friend, my life would stop having sense. the best part of all is that everything I wrote is truth, and I wrote it with my heart. I love you, friend. Promise me you will never stop being my friend, because  you are who helps me and supports me in the downs and the ups." - I don't feel very comfortable publicly saying to who I wrote this poem, but if you want to know, feel free to ask.

P.S.: Please note that you can if you want tell to who was directed the poem tell us, otherwise it isn't necessary. Thank you. :)
Please, do not spam. I'm talking seriously, don't make any spammy post here. :)

Promise me you will never stop being my friend, because  you are who helps me and supports me in the downs and the ups." - I don't feel very comfortable publicly saying to who I wrote this poem, but if you want to know, feel free to ask.

P.S.: Please note that you can if you want tell to who was directed the poem tell us, otherwise it isn't necessary. Thank you. :)

title: [GAME] A poem to a friend.

replies.body: I'm better with music than I am with words.
replies.body_tagged: I'm better with music than I am with words.

replies.body:
Do I have to write one... Or can I find one...? Too late! I found one:

When I'm with you,
eternity is a step away,
my love continues to grow,
with each passing day.

This treasure of love,
I cherish within my soul,
how much I love you...
you'll never really know.

You bring a joy to my heart,
I've never felt before,
with each touch of your hand,
I love you more and more.

Whenever we say goodbye,
whenever we part,
know I hold you dearly,
deep inside my heart.

So these seven words,
I pray you hold true,
"Forever And Always,
I Will Love You."

- Chris Engle -


I'm weird like that :')

replies.body:
FaZe Night  by: John Smith JF.


My mum
My dad
My crumy crumy tum

Always in Faze clan for you and my heart
For already know, Optic has won
Eternity past, and we're already gone.

For far away, this 1v1 shall live
In cold hard night, which our shall give
Through darkness, through night, Faze clan
UNITE!

replies.body:
Optic Delight by: John Smith Legacy JF.

Mmmmmm hmmm hmmmmmm
 Our soul... From the mountain we belong
 From the kingdom of the song
 We all have won

 FaZe is Cheeky
 When 1v1's Still reeking.
 We all have done

 Far Away, On a PS4
 In a cabin of our store
 A team of quickscopers
 Running within

 For what we have seen, and what has been
 We are Optic
 We are life

replies.body:
I fell off a tree and broke my knee.
I slipped down the stairs and ripped off my hair.
I hit my door and fell through the floor.
I played with my toys and died of joy.

I rolled off my bed and cracked my head.
I tripped on some yarn and shattered my arm.
I sprayed a power house and bloodied my nose.
I stumbled in the hall and landed on the saw.

As you can tell, my day wasn't so great.
So pay me your respect, and try not to hate.
replies.body_tagged:

As you can tell, my day wasn't so great.
So pay me your respect, and try not to hate.

replies.body:
Shooting Star by: Owl City

Close your tired eyes, relaxing them.
Count from 1 to 10 and open them.
All these heavy thoughts will try to weigh you down, but not this time.

Way up in the air, you're finally free, and you can stay up there, right next to me.
All this gravity will try to pull you down, but not this time.

When the sun goes down, and the lights burn out,
Then it's time for you to shine.
Brighter than the shooting star, so shine no matter where you are.
Fill the darkest night, with a brilliant light,
'cause it's time for you to shine.
Brighter than a shooting star, so shine no matter where you are, tonight.

Wooh, wooh, wooh.
Brighter than a shooting star,
Shine no matter where you are, tonight.

Gazing through my eyes, when the fire starts,
And fan the flame so hot, it melt our hearts.
All the pouring rain, will try to put it out, but not this time.

Let your colours burn, and brightly burst, into a million sparks, but all dispursed and illuminate a world,
That'll try to bring you down,
But not this time.

When the sun goes down, and the lights burn out,
Then it's time for you to shine.
Brighter than the shooting star, so shine no matter where you are.
Fill the darkest night, with a brilliant light,
'cause it's time for you to shine.
Brighter than a shooting star, so shine no matter where you are, tonight.

Wooh, wooh, wooh.
Brighter than a shooting star,
Shine no matter where you are, tonight.

A thousand heartbeats beating time, and makes this dark planet come alive. So when the lights flicker out tonight, you gotta shine.

When the sun goes down, and the lights burn out,
Then it's time for you to shine.
Brighter than the shooting star, so shine no matter where you are.
Fill the darkest night, with a brilliant light,
'cause it's time for you to shine.
Brighter than a shooting star, so shine no matter where you are, tonight.

Wooh, wooh, wooh.
Brighter than a shooting star,
Shine no matter where you are, tonight.

 
I dont know, I tought of this as an inspiring song so i decided to share it with you guys <3 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K7KMRBoqQUg
Yes I know this is not a poem, but songs are really Free Verse :P

replies.body:
The final moment, 
a last whisper echoing through the field, 
where my life ended, 
and truly started, 
I feel lost as ever, 
but somehow found in the same, 
for all I have done, 
I am truly ashamed. 

Now I stand here, 
bearing the weight of my actions, 
hoping it all not turn to only a fraction 

-Me (I got inspired :P)
